full_summary:
### Tender Announcement: Purchase of a Flow Cytometer with Accessories

#### Solicitation Number: 30006120

The Department of Fisheries and Oceans Canada, Canadian Coast Guard is soliciting proposals for the purchase of one Flow Cytometer with Accessories or Supplies, Training and Installation. The solicitation is open to suppliers who hold a Supply Arrangement for Laboratory and Scientific Equipment, Parts and Accessories, Services and Supplies from Public Works and Government Services Canada.

#### Key Requirements:

*   The procurement requires a device that is an AttuneMC CytPixMC flow cytometer with CytkickMC sampler and SmartStart CytPixMC software or equivalent.
*   The device must have two lasers (blue and red) and be able to accommodate a third violet laser.
*   The device must be equipped with a camera to take images of particles in flow.
*   The device should use acoustic focusing to improve the position of cells in flow.
*   The device should use lasers with a uniform intensity beam “flat-top” to ensure data quality.
*   The device must be equipped with a sampler such as the Life Technologies CytkickMC system or equivalent and be ready to accommodate samples in the form of tubes and 96 and 384 well plates.
*   The device must be repairable from Ontario or Quebec.

#### Evaluation Criteria:

*   Suppliers will be evaluated based on their ability to meet the mandatory technical criteria.
*   The responsive bidder with the lowest aggregate price will be recommended for contract award.

#### Tendering Procedure:

*   This tender is subject to the Supply Arrangement # E60PV-19EQUI for Laboratory and Scientific Equipment, Parts and Accessories, Services and Supplies.
*   Only suppliers who hold this supply arrangement are invited to bid.
*   Bids must be submitted in accordance with the instructions provided in the Supply Arrangement document.

#### Contact Information:

*   For further information, please contact Manon Paulin at (438) 468-3247 or Manon.Paulin@dfo-mpo.gc.ca.

#### Document Attachments:

*   The tender documents, including the Supply Arrangement document and scope of work, are available for download from Canada Buys (SAP Ariba) at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/50530/30006120---sa-cytometre---npp.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/50530/
